# azure-containers Reference

This directory contains 6 icons extracted from `azure-containers.excalidrawlib`.

## Available Icons

| Icon Name               | Filename                             |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| App Services            | `icons/App-Services.json`            |
| Batch Accounts          | `icons/Batch-Accounts.json`          |
| Container Instances     | `icons/Container-Instances.json`     |
| Container Registires    | `icons/Container-Registires.json`    |
| Kubernetes Services     | `icons/Kubernetes-Services.json`     |
| Service Fabric Clusters | `icons/Service-Fabric-Clusters.json` |

## Usage

Each icon JSON file contains the complete `elements` array needed to render that icon in Excalidraw.
You can copy the elements from these files into your Excalidraw diagrams.
